name: Three Sheets to the Wind (psjasmin)
description:
Join Atlas in crafting a story worth hearing to be told in the Sunken Sailor's Inn.

Blue, all around him. Boundless amounts of blue, all the way to the horizon, where the cloudless sky met the sea. Atlas was forced to abandon his previous life. Bound to a pirate ship, he is left to navigate through the unrelenting grasp of the ocean’s surprises – a rambunctious crew, unexpected companies, and dwindling illusions.

The story will be entirely determined by the choices you make for Atlas. Will you be able to return him home? Or down below to the waiting hands of the ocean floor? Be cautious, for each decision affects the character's fate!
